mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REQUEST WHERE MEMBER_IDX=(SELECT IDX FROM MEMBER WHERE USERNAME=#{username})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REQUEST VALUES(REQUEST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, (SELECT IDX FROM MEMBER WHERE USERNAME=#{username}))
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, IDX, TITLE, STATUS, REQ_DATE, ANS_DATE, USERNAME FROM (SELECT REQUEST.IDX AS IDX, REQUEST.TITLE AS TITLE , REQUEST.STATUS AS STATUS , TO_CHAR(REQUEST.REQ_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REQ_DATE , TO_CHAR(REQUEST.ANS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ANS_DATE, USERNAME FROM REQUEST INNER JOIN MEMBER ON REQUEST.MEMBER_IDX = MEMBER.IDX ORDER BY REQUEST.REQ_DATE DESC)) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT REQUEST.IDX, REQUEST.TITLE, REQUEST.STATUS, REQUEST.CONTENT, ANSWER.CONTENT AS ANSWER FROM REQUEST LEFT OUTER JOIN ANSWER ON REQUEST.IDX = ANSWER.REQUEST_IDX WHERE IDX = #{idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE REQUEST SET STATUS = 1, ANS_DATE = SYSTIMESTAMP WHERE IDX=#{idx}
